text: Flagenium is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is endemic to Madagascar. ==Species== *Flagenium farafanganense *Flagenium latifolium *Flagenium pedunculatum *Flagenium petrikense *Flagenium setosum *Flagenium triflorum ==References== Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxa named by Henri Ernest Baillon Category:Octotropideae
title: Flagenium
